items.episodeTitle: The latest ITV News headlines - with tributes to British mum killed in Australia
items.synopsis: Your 90 second summary of today's top stories from the ITV News team.

items.episodeTitle: Merseyside Police call fatal shooting of Elle Edwards "most appalling and callous murder"
items.synopsis: Officers say they will not rest until they bring the offenders behind the 26-year-old's death to justice.

items.episodeTitle: More delays and disruption as strikes continue - so who is walking out today?
items.synopsis: Border force workers, bus and train drivers and driving examiners are among those taking industrial action this week.

items.episodeTitle: Two arrested on suspicion of murdering footballer in Birmingham nightclub
items.synopsis: Cody Fisher was stabbed to death at the venue on Boxing Day. Two men are now being questioned by police.

items.episodeTitle: British family 'devastated' after mother killed defending Australian home
items.synopsis: Two teenage boys have been charged with the murder of a Emma Lovell, who was allegedly killed while defending her home in Australia on Boxing Day.

items.episodeTitle: Tributes paid to comedian and actor John Bird after his death is announced
items.synopsis: John Bird was part of the boom in satire in the 1960s and best known for his performances in the TV series 'Bremner, Bird and Fortune'.

items.episodeTitle: As two children under 10 die with Strep A in Scotland - what signs should you watch out for?
items.synopsis: With a growing of number of children dying from Strep A, what are the symptoms parents should look out for?

items.episodeTitle: Pope asks for special prayers for 'very sick' predecessor Benedict XVI
items.synopsis: Pope Francis has asked for prayers for his predecessor Pope Benedict, saying the former head of the Catholic Church is "very sick".

items.episodeTitle: Dozens dead and thousands left stranded by winter storm gripping North America
items.synopsis: At least sixty people are thought to have died in the blizzard which has brought huge swathes of the U.S. to a complete standstill.

items.episodeTitle: The Rundown: ITV News' daily update for teenagers
items.synopsis: Watch a new edition of The Rundown every afternoon.

items.episodeTitle: Energy saving advice to help you spend less on bills this winter
items.synopsis: As the government launches a new campaign to help manage household bills, what can you do to manage your costs?

items.episodeTitle: Unsettled, wet and windy: The latest ITV Weather forecast
items.synopsis: Watch the latest UK forecast from the ITV Weather team.
Catch up with the most recent edition of ITV News.
